name: Karl The Game 2
description:
Karl The Game 2

Welcome to the page for the demo version of Karl The Game 2.

This game presents to you an adventure through the colourful and colorless world of Karl and his friends, on a quest to defeat the tyranny built upon thou land by the game's antagonist, Larl. Traverse many different places, meet friends, defeat foes, and progress closer to your righteous end. 

Karl, an unwitty, but a kind and masterful pal, will be helped by his comrades, Chern and Maria. First being a determined fellow with a bit of knowledge in the dark arts of magic, and latter being a mage of fire and cybernetics.

The game is in semi-active development right as you're reading this, so if interested, would be wise to follow us on social media. Thanks, and have fun!
